item.title: Not Consumer Surplus
item.description: Inspired by Consumer Surplus, I thought it would be fun to suggest some economical things that I think add significant value to my life. I know this is quite weird, but at the same time, I find it interesting to learn from other people’s experiences so I figured I might as well share my own. Personal finance is one case where I’ve definitely benefited from the research done by others.

item.title: Reading List
item.description: Here’s some books or articles I’d recommend. I can’t claim this list is some sort of cohesive narrative, but I’d say all of these have something of merit regardless of political persuasion. I will add to this. Keep in mind that because I would like to have a job, this is not an exhaustive list of everything I consider worthwhile reading. Politics The Art of War, Sun Tzu. The History of the Peloponnesian War, Thucydides.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me via email.
